body.name: Milton Thermosteel Flip Lid 750, Double Walled Vacuum Insulated Thermos 750 ml | 25 oz | 24 Hours Hot and Cold Water Bottle with Cover, Stainless Steel, BPA Free, Leak Proof | Silver
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 4 hrs 14 mins
features: ✅ Please ensure you choose the perfect size for your needs by consulting our detailed sizing information present on our selling images. Take a moment to review the size chart before placing your order with us.

✅ Despite its sizable presence, rest assured that the interior capacity perfectly aligns with the specified title and selected item. The size may seem larger due to it's robust double-wall vacuum insulation.

✅ To optimizse Hot & Cold performance precondition the thermos with hot or cold water and fill to maximum capacity when using it. Avoid partial filling for maximum effectiveness & secure the lid tightly for keeping temperature locked in.

✅ 24-hour temperature retention - Milton Stainless Steel Bottle is designed with double-wall vacuum insulation and an inner copper coating. This unique design ensures that your beverages stay hot or cold for a full 24 hours, regardless of the ambient temperature. So, you can enjoy your favorite drinks at the perfect temperature all day long.

✅ Leak proof water bottle - This Metal Water Bottle has a leak-proof design that prevents any unwanted drips or messes. The best part about it is the flip lid that allows you to open and close the bottle with just one hand. No more twisting or unscrewing caps, just flip and sip! Additionally, the lid can be used as a cup, making it even more practical and convenient.

✅ Stainless steel water bottle - The Insulated Bottle of Milton Thermosteel Flip Lid Bottle is made of high-quality SS 304 stainless steel, durable, rust-resistant, and easy to clean. Providing a Vacuum-Insulated Water Bottle with a sleek and stylish finish that will keep up your modern style while keeping your drinks one sip away.

✅ Made for active lifestyles - Whether you need a Gym Bottle or one to take on your outdoor adventures, the Thermosteel Flip Lid Bottle fits almost any need to keep up with your hydration goals. Suitable for filling with hot or cold beverages, coffee, tea, juice, or water. Take it with you to the gym, office, school, or anywhere!

✅ Caring tips - To keep your steel water bottle in good condition, clean it with mild detergent and use a brush to remove any leftovers inside. It's easy to clean and safe to put in the dishwasher. To prevent any odors, store it in an open area.

✅ Milton: Founded in 1972, Milton has become one of the most celebrated homeware brands across the globe, Milton aims to provide high-quality products that solve consumer problems by continuously innovating, setting new standards and doing outstanding work, Believes in moving forward, evolving and bringing the winds of change to every household with its product range.
✅ Manufactured & Marketed by Hamilton Housewares Private Limited

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: With the Milton Thermosteel bottle, you can enjoy your preferred beverage at any time of the day. Its body is crafted from high-quality SS 304 stainless steel, which is resistant to rust and easy to clean.Thanks to its double-walled design, your drink's temperature will remain steady, as heat transfer is prevented by the vacuum-insulated space between the inner and outer walls. No more spills or messes, thanks to its leak-proof construction. Whether you crave a warm cup of coffee in the morning, a refreshing juice in the evening, or a cold water in the afternoon, this bottle meets all of your beverage needs.
Experience the convenience of this bottle's vacuum insulation, which keeps your beverages at the perfect temperature for a full 24 hours, whether you prefer them hot or cold.

Easy to Fill The bottle has a wide mouth that makes it easy to fill, drink and clean. Sleek Design Thermosteel Flip Lid Bottle has a sleek design and a matte finish that makes it look stylish and elegant. Made for Active Lifestyles The Thermosteel bottle from Milton is the perfect choice for anyone seeking a portable bottle for work, travel, the gym, or home use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It actually does what is advertised
reviews.reviewText: This Thermos does keep coffee HOT for at least 12 hours. Not just warm or fairly-hot, it is HOT!Great product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keep hot water for 12hrs
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for taking out hot water to make baby formula outside home and during trips. It worked perfectly for the thanksgiving trip. Once I refilled hot water, it lasted 12 hrs.But I realized it leaks when I lean the bottle to pour.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Keeps warm but not hot
reviews.reviewText: I use this thermos for my baby’s formula water. The water temp definitely does not stay hot for 24 hours. It is noticeably cooler after 5-7 hours. Still works better than most thermoses I’ve used.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kept iced coffee ice cold for over 8 hours!
reviews.reviewText: Incredible, this kept ice cold drinks cold for over 8 hours. My only beef is cleaning the spout, but otherwise this is a great buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the job !
reviews.reviewText: My husband loves it. Keeps his coffee hot for long period of time. That’s what he was looking for. It’s slime and fits well in his work bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Actually keeps water hot!
reviews.reviewText: I’m super happy with this product. I had previously been using a different flask which only kept the contents warm for up to 7 hours. This flask lasts just under 24 hours, which is a huge improvement. Definitely recommend this product to others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Well it doesnt really keep the coffee hot only warm

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars How Hot is Hot?
reviews.reviewText: The main reason I bought this thermos was the pour spout. It's much handier than unscrewing the lid. It does leak a little, maybe it comes out through the spout? Not sure, but I don't travel with the thermos, I just use it to store hot water for later use throughout the day, so I don't have to fire up the tea kettle again.The product description says that it keeps the contents "hot" for 24 hours with no heat transfer. Not sure what temperature is being used to define hot, but I conducted readings over several days using a Pyrex digital meat thermometer. The first measurements I took were from first filling the thermos with boiling water, screwing on the lid and cap, and taking readings every two hours. I was going to take the readings by inserting the probe through the pour spout, but it's not a straight passage through, so I had to unscrew the lid each time.For the first six hours, the temperature would drop by about 10 degrees every two hours (5 degrees per hour). And it was apparent that heat was transferring out through the top (maybe because the lid isn't as insulated as the rest of the body?) because the cap cup was warm to the touch. So after six hours, the temperature dropped to about 174° F. Still hot enough to brew some tea, or coffee from grounds.After the first six hours, the temperature drop seemed to taper off to about 5 degrees every two hours. So at about the 12 hour mark, the temperature was around 156°F. At the 24 hour mark, the temperature was 131°F. I'm guessing that if you use the thermos to store a beverage, like coffee, this should be hot enough (although fast food places serve coffee around 170°F).In case the process of opening the lid to take measurements lets a lot of the heat escape, I also conducted a survey where I took readings at only the 12 and 24 hour mark. In this survey, the 12 hour temp was 159°F and the 24 hour reading was 136°F, so slightly warmer, but not significantly.I guess 131°F after 24 hours would be technically hot. That is, if you put a hot beverage like coffee in there, it would still be pretty hot. But if you use it to store hot water for later use (like I do), you could probably make a cup of hot chocolate or instant coffee. But it seems to be too cold for brewing tea, or brewing coffee from grounds.

...not "hassle free" cleaning, if handwashing.😕At the bottom of the thermos (inside) there is a separate ring of metal that is not tightly welded to the actual bottle, allowing a small gap for dirt, germs, other nasties...to accumulate between the two surfaces. Big disappointment.It might be OK with dishwasher cleaning only, but I don't have one so not an option. Otherwise looks nice, the cloth case is a good feature too. But REALLY clean comes first for my priorities so this is headed back for a refund.😕
Utilisation très facile, elle garde la chaleur pour une durée très raisonnable. L'eau reste aussi très froid. Parfait! pour les longs déplacements sibesoin de garder l'eau chaude ou froide.
Beau et bon produit. J'aurais aimé un peu plus petit et avec un embout plus facile à boire directement.C'est parfait.
Hält Heißwasser mindesten 12 Stunden, Kaffegetränk bisschen weniger. - das besser als andere

Third flask after getting replacement of a differentModel twice. Now it has been more than a week and the flask is performing perfectly well. Keeping my coffee warm and piping hot for more than 10 hours. Good enough for my whole working hours.
